attributes.action: Revoke the Knighthood granted to ex Prime Minister Tony Blair.
attributes.additional_details: This man is reviled by the general public who blame him for taking the country into an unnecessary war, costing many lives.
attributes.background: Simply to revoke or prevent ex Prime Minister Tony Blair from being granted a Knighthood.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that relate to honours and appointments, which includes calling for an honour to be removed.
